personal.name: Alexandre Machado de Oliveira
personal.title: Sr. Fullstack | Automation Expert | AI Engineer
personal.bio: With over 15 years of experience, I bring a deep, full-spectrum skill set - from frontend UI/UX to backend systems, databases, and cloud infrastructure. I enjoy creating reliable, scalable systems that combine beautiful interfaces with powerful backend logic.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web applications with React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern frameworks.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Cross-platform mobile apps using React Native for iOS and Android.

services.title: AI Integration
services.description: GPT chatbots, LLM applications, RAG systems with OpenAI and Anthropic.

services.title: Automation
services.description: Business workflow automation with Make.com, n8n, Zapier, and custom solutions.

services.title: Database & Backend
services.description: Scalable APIs, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, GraphQL, and cloud infrastructure.

services.title: AI Agents
services.description: Intelligent AI agents for customer support, Q&A, and content generation.

experience.description: Building AI-powered applications, GPT-based chatbots, and automation workflows. Developing full-stack solutions with Next.js, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure.
Led development of enterprise web applications. Implemented CI/CD pipelines, Docker deployments, and mentored junior developers.
Built responsive web interfaces and RESTful APIs. Worked with clients to deliver scalable solutions using modern frameworks.

projects.title: Mamatoto Village
projects.description: Comprehensive maternity client management system for healthcare providers delivering maternal care services. Features pregnancy episode documentation, care team collaboration, and social needs assessment.

projects.title: SpareBox Storage
projects.description: Self-storage platform serving 9+ states with location search, online rentals, secure access management, and customer portal. SEO-optimized with contact-free extended hours storage solutions.

projects.title: Prophet - Street Rates Management
projects.description: Self-storage rate management platform with facility tracking, occupancy analytics, and automated rate publishing. Built comprehensive dashboard for managing street rates across multiple facilities.

projects.title: AI Customer Support Agent
projects.description: GPT-based intelligent chatbot with memory/context handling for customer support automation and expert Q&A.

projects.title: Automation Workflow Platform
projects.description: Low-code/no-code automation system integrating Make.com, n8n, and Zapier for business process automation.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Scalable e-commerce solution with real-time inventory, payment processing, and SSR/SSG optimization.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in Distributed Systems and Machine Learning

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.feedback: Happy delivered an exceptional AI chatbot that transformed our customer support. His expertise in OpenAI and LangChain is outstanding. Highly recommend for any AI project!

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.feedback: Working with Happy was a game-changer. He built our entire automation workflow from scratch, saving us 40+ hours per week. Professional, responsive, and incredibly skilled.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.feedback: Happy's full-stack expertise helped us launch our e-commerce platform in record time. Clean code, great communication, and delivered ahead of schedule!
